price: 17 Quant à ceux qui suivent le droit chemin, Allah raffermit leurs pas et remplit leur cœur de crainte.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
